DOC.brief_summary: To investigate of high cup/disc ratio in children.
DOC.brief_title: The High Cup/Disc Ratio in Children
DOC.detailed_description: ophthalmologic examination 1. cycloplegic refraction 2. axial length and anterior chamber depth 3. intraocular pressure B. optic nerve head and retinal nerve fiber layer 1. disc photography 2. Heidelberg Retina Tomograph
DOC.criteria: high cup/disc ratio more than 0.5 age : five to twelve previous surgery (except strabismus surgery) previous glaucomatous medication history poor cooperated children.
